name: INSearchForAccountsIntent
desc: A user request for information about their accounts in your app.

items.name: init(accountNickname: INSpeakableString?, accountType: INAccountType, organizationName: INSpeakableString?, requestedBalanceType: INBalanceType)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified search parameters.

items.name: var accountNickname: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The nickname that the user assigned to the account.

items.name: var organizationName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of an organization attached to the account.

items.name: var requestedBalanceType: INBalanceType
items.desc: The balance type requested by the user.

items.name: enum INBalanceType
items.desc: Constants indicating the meaning of a balance.
